participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and strategic, enjoys intellectual challenges and is caring towards pets.
participant_1.background: I'm single and with two dogs. I don't drink alcohol. I like to play chess. I am in my thirties.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and a bit shy, prefers gaming over socializing and struggles with school.
participant_2.background: I love to play pobox. I am a 12 year old girl. I don't have many friends. I hate school. I have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

content.text: I am at home today. And you?
